description: A light and fluffy homemade vegan buttercream frosting made with fresh strawberries.
name: VEGAN STRAWBERRY BUTTERCREAM FROSTING
recipeIngredient: 8 tablespoon vegan butter (We use Earth Balance, let it soften slightly)

recipeInstructions.text: n a large mixing bowl, whip the sugar and butter, and SLOWLY (see note) add the strawberry puree until you reach the desired consistency. If you want it really thick and stiff, add less. If you want a thinner frosting, add more. Just be sure to add the puree slowly.
Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to a week. Let it come to room temperature before using.
